channel.title: Smiles and an "Oh Thanks" - A Good Thing?
channel.description:
[i]Note: This is a joke post copying an older post I had made just over 2 years ago. Please don't take it seriously.[/i]
So today I talked to this girl I had never talked to before in my entire life, and I ended the unwanted, not-my-fault rushed conversation with a "But yeah, I think you have really beautiful eyes" and just threw it out there because her friends were about to be right next to her and were already calling her name. She responded kinda shocked with an "Oh, thanks" and also a big smile, from what I could tell. Long run-ons. Poop.
Is this good or bad?
~Lin
[i]PS: Try to remember this is a joke. I don't consider it's spam, but more or less an entertainment post. It can't hurt, can it? Also no it's not a lie. That wouldn't be fun.[/i]

item.title: Smiles and an "Oh Thanks" - A Good Thing?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.source: Smiles and an "Oh Thanks" - A Good Thing?

item.title: Smiles and an "Oh Thanks" - A Good Thing?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:9, topic:430731”]Lin has been on GameDev forum guys. L2Goovertothatsiteeveryonceandawhile.[/quote]Every day.

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:11, topic:430731”]Well if it got more attention I’d go :([/quote]It doesn’t get attention because not many people here work on real games. MistaBigBoss and a couple others are the only ones with projects. There’s nothing major really going on. No active tutorial posters or anything.

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:7, topic:430731”]When she says Oh thanks it means shes accepting the compliment…ask her out …[/quote]Lol; I’m very far from being even the slightest bit close to being a beginner close-to novice with girls, but all girls that aren’t bitches accept compliments regardless whether or not they like other guy. So no. Besides, girls cut into development time.

Read full topic
